meanings.definition: A device used to spray liquid
meanings.sent1: The sprayers in the garden help water the plants efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used the sprayers to apply pesticides to the crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the sprayers, creating a fountain of water.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sprayers of kindness, spreading warmth to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The sprayers hummed softly as they released a fine mist into the air.

meanings.sent1: The sprayers painted the walls of the house with precision.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti sprayers left their mark on the abandoned building.
meanings.sent3: The sprayers at the car wash joked about turning everything into art with their spray cans.
meanings.sent4: She was a sprayer of joy, brightening up every room she entered.
meanings.sent5: The sprayers lined up, ready to coat the surface with a fresh layer of paint.

meanings.sent1: The sudden sprayers of rain caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: The sprayers of perfume filled the room with a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The playful children engaged in a sprayers battle with water guns.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like sprayers of happiness, spreading contagious joy.
meanings.sent5: The sprayers of paint danced across the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
